title: Green Horseshoe Balloon
summaries: The Green Horseshoe Balloon is an accessory that grants immunity to fall damage, increases jump height by 33%, jump speed by 30%, and grants a double jump. The height of the first jump is increased from 6 blocks to 10.5 blocks (~75% increase), while the double jump's height is increased from 10.5 blocks to 18.5 blocks, reaching a total of 29 blocks with both jumps. It also has the fart sound of the previous fart double jumps.
Jump height is oddly reduced when underwater, to 18 blocks (7 blocks + ~11 blocks from Fart jump).

statistics.Tooltip:
Allows the holder to double jump
Increases jump height and negates fall damage
statistics.Sell: 3
